REGISTRATION.INFO: For full details of how we will treat your information view our
REGISTRATION.PHONE_ERROR: Please enter a valid phone number
REGISTRATION.DESCRIPTIONONE: Agilent and the institutions who use Agilent's CrossLab products ('the services') collect personal data from you in order to create a user account and to register you as an authorized user of the services provided by Agilent and the company.
REGISTRATION.DESCRIPTIONTWO: When you register for an account on the Integrated Service Experience platform, you will also automativally be registered for an Agilent.com account in order to access this product. Automatic registration with the product and Agilent.com will allow users to view private agreements (e.g.,service contracts) and other personalized content on Agilent.com.
REGISTRATION.DESCRIPTIONTHREE: To create an account, you must provide your email address(es) and country, as well as your name, phone number and billing address, if required.
REGISTRATION.DESCRIPTIONFOUR: We will also collect and store details of your usage by collecting log files.
REGISTRATION.DESCRIPTIONFIVE: agilent collects this personal data for the legitimate purpose of enabling the service and will share your data with the company whose data you access.
REGISTRATION.DESCRIPTIONSIX: For further details on how we treat your personal data and how you can exprcise your privacy rights please view our privacy policy:https://www.agilent.com/home/privacy-policy.

REGISTRATION_FAILED.ISSUE: There has been an issue with your registration.
REGISTRATION_FAILED.EMAIL_INFO: This email is associated with an existing Agilent account:

ACTIVATION_EXPIRED.ACTIVATION_INFO: Please click Resend Email button to recieve another email with yur login information.
ACTIVATION_EXPIRED.EXPIRED_TIME: Please note that this link will expire in 7 days.

CONFIRM_ACCOUNT.SET_ACCOUNT: We are working to set up your account
CONFIRM_ACCOUNT.VERIFY_ACCOUNT: Please expect an email within the next 15 minuites to verify your account
CONFIRM_ACCOUNT.WELCOME: Thank you again for registering, and welcome to CrossLab!
